full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL BA'I TSUL NI BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES PA LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA, ,@008B GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL BA'I TSUL 'DI NI DON DU GNYER BA DGA' BA'I NGOR, SOG KHYAB PA SMYON BLUN PA DGE SLONG RGYA MTSO CHOM DAR GYIS DAM PA'I GSUNG RABS LA BRTEN NAS SBYAR BAR BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI, DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG CHOS DPAL LO, ,'DI KYANG BLA MA YI DAM LHA BKA' STOD CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS, ,GA-YEL MED BSRUNG SKYOB 'PHRIN LAS BSGRUB, ,DAG PA'I ZHING DU 'KHRID PAR SHOG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
